title: Tom Talks Ep. 3 w/ DJ Premier
description:
SPONSORS: - Go to https://www.babbel.com/ and get Babbel's special offer of three months free with a purchase of a three month subscription with promo code MOM. - Go to https://www.adameve.com/ and enter offer code YMH at checkout, and get 10 tantalizing FREE gifts! - Get 10% off site-wide when you use promo code MOM at https://truff.com/ - Get Honey for free at https://www.joinhoney.com/MOM

Get ready, because this week Tom Segura talks to one of his top hip hop idols, DJ Premier! They go over Preemo's musical inspirations, his methods, and what it was like to work on some of the most iconic songs/albums in hip hop like Nas's Illmatic and Notorious B.I.G.'s Unbelievable. Preemo sheds light on working with Jay-Z, J Dilla, Gang Starr, Limp Bizkit and more!
